title: New: THØSS – Swing
content:
From the sounds of THØSS’s debut track, Swing, he could end up swinging one of two ways – either along the Newton Faulkner, slightly awkward yet endearing folk route, or as I’d probably guess is more likely, bringing in more funky, current sounding electronic elements.

Definitely filled with potential, it’ll be interesting to see where THØSS goes next.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
